data.caption: Clarification sought from Gem Aromatics Ltd

The Exchange has sought clarification from Gem Aromatics Ltd on October 24 2025 with reference to Movement in Volume.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Gem Aromatics Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 26 2025 the equity shares of Gem Aromatics Ltd (Scrip Code: 544491) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250825-dated August 25 2025.
